subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Prudential Center (Newark)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. announced that Seton Hall was chosen as the host school for a regional final of the 2011 men’s basketball tournament.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. announced that Seton Hall was chosen as the host school for a regional final of the 2011 men’s basketball tournament.
